DOC.HEADLINE: MIAMI MAKES SIX ERRORS BUT ADVANCES IN SERIES
DOC.TEXT: Danny Buxbaum ' s two-run double in the seventh inning helped Miami overcome six errors as the top-seeded Hurricanes stayed alive Monday in the College World_Series with a 7-5 victory over Auburn . " that ' s probably about as ugly a win as we ' ve ever had , " said a relieved Hurricanes Coach Jim Morris . Miami ( 49-13 ) advanced to today ' s elimination game against the loser of Monday night ' s game between Oklahoma and Arizona State . Auburn ( 44-21 ) was ousted , losing both games in its first CWS appearance since 1976 . Miami took_advantage of an error for four unearned_runs in the first . The Hurricanes scored three times in the seventh .
